occurrences.knownSentence: I want to speak Spanish with you now.
occurrences.targetSentence: Quiero hablar español contigo ahora.

occurrences.knownSentence: I want to try as hard as I can today.
occurrences.targetSentence: Quiero intentar lo más que pueda hoy.

occurrences.knownSentence: Because I want to meet people who speak Spanish.
occurrences.targetSentence: Porque quiero conocer a personas que hablan español.

occurrences.knownSentence: I'm trying to learn.
occurrences.targetSentence: Estoy intentando aprender.

occurrences.knownSentence: I'm trying to remember a word.
occurrences.targetSentence: Estoy intentando recordar una palabra.

occurrences.knownSentence: I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.
occurrences.targetSentence: Voy a practicar hablar con otra persona.

occurrences.knownSentence: I'm going to try to explain what I mean.
occurrences.targetSentence: Voy a intentar explicar lo que quiero decir.

occurrences.knownSentence: I'm going to start talking more soon.
occurrences.targetSentence: Voy a empezar a hablar más pronto.

occurrences.knownSentence: I speak a little Spanish now.
occurrences.targetSentence: Hablo un poco de español ahora.

occurrences.knownSentence: But I'm a little tired this morning.
occurrences.targetSentence: Pero estoy un poco cansado esta mañana.

occurrences.knownSentence: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.
occurrences.targetSentence: No estoy seguro de si puedo recordar toda la oración.

occurrences.knownSentence: I'm not sure if I can help you at the same time.
occurrences.targetSentence: No estoy seguro si puedo ayudarte al mismo tiempo.

occurrences.knownSentence: But I don't want to stop talking.
occurrences.targetSentence: Pero no quiero dejar de hablar.

occurrences.knownSentence: Why do you want to stop?
occurrences.targetSentence: ¿Por qué quieres parar?

occurrences.knownSentence: I've been learning for about a week.
occurrences.targetSentence: He estado aprendiendo durante aproximadamente una semana.

occurrences.knownSentence: I was not thinking about how to answer.
occurrences.targetSentence: No estaba pensando en cómo responder.

occurrences.knownSentence: But I don't worry about making mistakes.
occurrences.targetSentence: Pero no me preocupo por cometer errores.

occurrences.knownSentence: I cannot remember how to say what I wanted to say.
occurrences.targetSentence: No puedo recordar cómo decir lo que quería decir.

occurrences.knownSentence: What are you looking for?
occurrences.targetSentence: ¿Qué buscas?

occurrences.knownSentence: Could you say that again a little more slowly?
occurrences.targetSentence: ¿Podrías decir eso otra vez un poco más despacio?

occurrences.knownSentence: I think that you're doing very well.
occurrences.targetSentence: Creo que lo estás haciendo muy bien.
